metadata.name: Donation Machine In The Last Floors
metadata.directory: donation machine in the last floors
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod adds an unjammed [u][b]Donation Machine[/b][/u] to the first room of the following floors: - Corpse - Blue Womb (Hush) - Cathedral, Sheol - Chest, Dark Room - The Void - Home
In addition, this mod adds an unjammed [u][b]Greed Donation[/b][/u] Machine to the first room of the floor: - Ultra Greed
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Afterbirth+ & Repentance
